plot: Chronicles the lives of individuals who are faced with everyday problems. With all different choices in life, they realize how unhappy they are and make the decision to pursue their dreams.
title: Beyond ri zi zhi mo qi shao nian qiong
plot_es: Chronicles the lives of individuals who are faced with everyday problems. With all different choices in life, they realize how unhappy they are and make the decision to pursue their dreams.
original_name: Beyond ri zi zhi mo qi shao nian qiong
plot_en: Chronicles the lives of individuals who are faced with everyday problems. With all different choices in life, they realize how unhappy they are and make the decision to pursue their dreams.
